response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both us and you, amounting to $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage and ensure you secure this valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with excellence. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
